title: War of the Roses: Do You Still Want To Get Married?
description: Avery recently found a text in her fiance, Nick's, phone that she questioned him about and now has admitted to cheating on her last summer.  They had to postpone their wedding due to COVID but now Avery is questioning if they should go through with this wedding.
itunes:summary: Avery recently found a text in her fiance, Nick's, phone that she questioned him about and now has admitted to cheating on her last summer.  They had to postpone their wedding due to COVID but now Avery is questioning if they should go through with this wedding.
